```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(hablar)
library(janitor)
theme_set(theme_light())
```

```{r}
spiders = readxl::read_xlsx('spiders.csv.xlsx')

spiders %>% head()
spiders %>% skim()


clean = spiders %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  convert(fct(
    family
  ))

clean %>% skim()
  

clean
```
